You should be able to use GParted and delete both of the partitions you said you made. Make sure it shows a large block of unallocated space. Make the swap, then make the / root partition
Swap is like what the page file is in Windows. How much RAM is in your laptop?
By default, 600MB is usually allocated and I personally use 1 GB
